rdf:Description.dc:title: The Russian Grandmother’s Wonder Tales
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Louise Seymour Houghton (1838–1920)
Władysław Teodor Benda (1873–1948)

rdf:Description.dc:subject: Tales -- Slavic countries
rdf:Description.dc:description: A nice collection of Russian folklore stories framed into a story of a Grandmother telling those stories to her grandchild. Includes some nice illustrations.
